title: How can I see how much a champion costs
body:
Hi, I just installed the game today and it's really fun. However I got one question.
If I go to champions on the menu I can see all the champions but I can't ssee how much they cost.
I have 600 points so yeah. Like I said I'm new so please don't call me dumb :P xD

replies.body: Welcome to League of Legends, Osenator.  :D :D  You're likely looking at your Collection panel, and not the Store.  If you're on the updated client, you should see an option for Store right next to your [IP/RP balance](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824-Reward-IP-XP-System-Breakdown).  You'll be able to check the price of champions through there as well as some other goodies.  Let me know if that helps, and good luck on the Summoner's Rift!

Thank you bro. I really want Master Yi  l like those attackers. Thank you very much and yes I'll have even more fun on Summoner's Rift!
EDIT 14-4-17 08:57 : It actually worked thanks.
